{{Infobox_University |name = Ateneo de Manila University
John Gokongwei School of Management |native_name = Pamantasang Ateneo de Manila
John Gokongwei na Paaralan ng Pamamahala |image = |established = 2000 |type = Roman Catholic |dean = Rodolfo P. Ang, M.B.A. |location = [[Ateneo de Manila University]], Loyola Heights, [[Quezon City]], [[Metro Manila]], [[Philippines]] [[Image:Flag of the Philippines.svg|22px]] |website= [http://jgsom.ateneo.edu/ http://jgsom.ateneo.edu] |}} The '''Ateneo de Manila John Gokongwei School of Management''' is one of the four [[Loyola Schools]] of the [[Ateneo de Manila University]]. ==History== {| style="float:right; margin:1em 1em 1em 1em; width:24em; border: 1px solid #a0a0a0; padding: 2px; bg-color=yellow; text-align:right;" |- style="text-align:center;" |- bgcolor="#0260A8" align="center" |'''Deans of the John Gokongwei School of Management''' |- style="text-align:left; font-size:x-small;" | '''Manuel Velasco 2000-2002''' |- style="text-align:left; font-size:x-small;" | '''Rodolfo P. Ang 2002âpresent''' |} In 2000, the School of Arts and Sciences of the university, which comprises the College and the Graduate School, restructured into the four Loyola Schools of Humanities, Management, Science and Engineering, and Social Sciences. The School of Management was named after the Filipino businessman John Gokongwei who donated Php 200 million for the construction of the school's main building, which was dedicated in 2002. The school offers undergraduate programs in management and entrepreneurship. ==Academic Departments== http://jgsom.ateneo.edu/Undergraduate Bulletin of Information, pp. 139-178, 2009 ed. [[Image:JGSOM.jpg|thumb|right|250px|The John Gokongwei School of Management building]] ===Finance and Accounting=== * Minor in Finance ===Leadership and Strategy=== * Minor in Management * Minor in International Business * Minor in Strategic Human Resources Management ===Marketing and Law=== * Minor in Marketing ===Quantitative Methods and Information Technology=== * Minor in Decision Science * Minor in Information Technology * Minor in Project Management ==Special programs== http://jgsom.ateneo.edu/Undergraduate Bulletin of Information, pp. 139-178, 2009 ed. * Minor in Enterprise Development / School of Management Business Accelerator Program * Junior Term Abroad * JGSOM Student Enterprise Center * Business Study Tour ==Degree Programs== http://ls.ateneo.edu/system.php?LS=staticpages&id=1248416526264 * Bachelor of Science in Management - Standard and Honors Programs (BS MGT/BS MGT-H) * Bachelor of Science in Management Major in Communications Technology Management (BS ComTech) * Bachelor of Science in Management Major in Legal Management (BS LM) * Bachelor of Science in Management Engineering (BS ME) * Bachelor of Science in Management of Applied Chemistry (BS MAC) ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Ateneo de Manila University}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ateneo John Gokongwei School Of Management}} [[Category:Ateneo de Manila University]]
